name: Bago Full Day Tour from Yangon
description: Bago, formerly known as Hanthawaddy of Mon Kingdom in 15th century. Your professional English speaking guide will bring you to some popular landmarks and attractions of Bago such as Kyakhat Wine Monastery, Shwemawdaw Pagoda, Reclining Buddha of Shwethelyaung, the four Giant Buddha images of Kyaikpun Pagoda and the excavation site and restoration work of Kanbawzathadi, the palace of famous King Bayinnaung. Lunch and hotel transfer is included.
